entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Temperature falling to zero this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain early this morning and ending this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late this morning. Temperature falling to zero this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022
